text: Musa Yaffa (born 15 July 1994) is a Gambian international footballer who plays for Banjul Hawks, as a defender. ==Career== Born in Sutukoba, he has played club football for Bakau United and Banjul Hawks. He made his international debut for Gambia in 2016. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Gambian footballers Category:The Gambia international footballers Category:Bakau United FC players Category:Banjul Hawks FC players Category:Association football defenders
title: Musa Yaffa
